name: places/ChIJg3tw5ehYwokRufaxXoOrnyk
formattedAddress: 260 E 66th St First Floor, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 260 E 66th St First Floor, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: If you want a DR with a massive Ego trip this is the guy to go to. No complaints on the surgery actually an excellent job. His personality on the other hand and his unethical approach to his patients is horrendous. I was delayed treatment due to workers compensation and explained tho my doctor my situation of being almost 5 months delayed. All he kept telling me insensitively was how a line backer was back to his job already. I am a plumber not a football player. I have a family and a young daughter who relies on me putting food on the table and because I was still in pain and he had a massive ego he decided to impulsively write a report in my workers comp file that I was fine and should receive the minimum amount disability possible . How a guy who probably sits in a large house can do this to his patient who is addressing his pains and issues he’s still having is absolutely inhumane and atrocious. Find a better person to do your surgery, someone who will care and listen after the surgery is done and who actually has a conscience to not screw over his own patient in pain. Your job was to help, not make the situation worse like you did. Hope you have a nice dinner knowing you took the food off my families table.
